title.content-text: 8.4.1 - Configuring ACL's for Application and Port Filtering

brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts a list of types of TCP protocols and port numbers for the following command:
R1 (config) # access-list 101 permit tcp host 192.168.1.1 host 192.168.2.89 eq?

The computer user says, I need to filter email traffic. What port numbers should I filter?

The following protocols are highlighted:
pop3 Post Office Protocol v3 (110)
smtp Simple Mail Transport Protocol (25)
